summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) Person Lookout Query record showing that Jeffrey Epstein's record was accessed on July 8, 2019, by a user at the CBP Reston National Targeting Center. It indicates a query was run on Epstein's TECSID identifier.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a record of a Person Lookout Query performed on his TECSID (P3N06596100A01) by CBP personnel.

events.title: CBP Person Lookout Query on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection officer at the Reston National Targeting Center accessed Jeffrey Epstein's record via a Person Lookout Query using his TECSID.

locations: CBP-RESTON, NAIL TARGETING CTR (U.S. Customs and Border Protection Reston National Targeting Center, Reston, Virginia, USA)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's law enforcement record (TECSID: P3N06596100A01) was accessed via a Person Lookout Query on July 8, 2019.
The query was performed by a user from the CBP Reston National Targeting Center.
The record indicates ongoing monitoring or investigation of Epstein by U.S. Customs and Border Protection around this date.
